rules: Rule1: If the survivor gets sick, then it is not the case that the survivor drinks unpurified water.
Rule2: Provided that the survivor needs medical help, the survivor gets sick.
Rule3: Whenever the survivor finds medicinal plants, the survivor knows herbal remedies.
Rule4: Under the condition that the survivor finds medicinal plants, it is not the case that the survivor knows herbal remedies.
Rule5: Either the survivor finds medicinal plants, or if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, then the survivor needs medical help.
Rule6: Provided that the survivor locates a shelter spot, the survivor finds a cave.
Rule7: Either the survivor locates a shelter spot, or the survivor constructs a lean-to.
Rule8: Either the survivor encounters a predator, or if the survivor constructs a lean-to, then if the survivor builds a shelter, the survivor can survive in the forest.
Rule9: Whenever the survivor sees a bear, it is not the case that the survivor encounters a predator.
Rule10: Either the survivor sees a bear, or the survivor sees a wolf.
Rule11: If the survivor avoids dangerous water, then if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, the survivor does not drink unpurified water.
Rule12: Either the survivor avoids dangerous water, or the survivor tests water quality.
Rule13: If the survivor tests water quality, then the survivor observes an animal drinking.

Rule14: If the survivor checks for signs, then if the survivor observes an animal drinking, then if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, the survivor does not drink unpurified water.
Rule15: Either the survivor checks for signs, or the survivor follows animal tracks.
Rule16: Provided that the survivor survives the first day, the survivor survives the second day.

Rule17: Whenever the survivor survives the second day, if the survivor follows animal tracks, then if the survivor observes an animal drinking, then if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, the survivor does not drink unpurified water.
Rule18: If the survivor finds running water, then the survivor does not drink from a stagnant pool.
Rule19: Either the survivor finds running water, or the survivor follows a stream.
Rule20: Under the condition that the survivor follows a stream, the survivor reaches a waterfall.
Rule21: Whenever the survivor assesses a water source, if the survivor reaches a waterfall, then the survivor does not drink from a stagnant pool.
Rule22: Under the condition that the survivor tests water purity, if the survivor reaches a waterfall, then the survivor does not drink from a stagnant pool.
Rule23: If the survivor makes a safe drink, then either the survivor assesses a water source, or the survivor tests water purity.
Rule24: Provided that the survivor uses a filter, the survivor makes a safe drink.
Rule25: If the survivor boils water, then the survivor makes a safe drink.
Rule26: Whenever the survivor has safe water, either the survivor uses a filter, or the survivor boils water.
Rule27: Under the condition that the survivor drinks safely, the survivor has safe water.
Rule28: If the survivor recognizes contamination, then if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, the survivor does not drink unpurified water.
Rule29: If the survivor sees an algae bloom, then it is not the case that the survivor smells chemicals.
Rule30: Whenever the survivor inspects water closely, if the survivor sees an algae bloom, then the survivor smells chemicals.
Rule31: Either the survivor inspects water closely, or the survivor tests with a kit.
Rule32: If the survivor ignores warnings, then the survivor drinks anyway.

Rule33: Either the survivor signals rescue, or if it is not the case that not having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water leads to the survivor needing medical help, then the survivor does not find help.
Rule34: Either the survivor finds a spring, or the survivor finds a river.
Rule35: Provided that the survivor is rescued, the survivor does not signal rescue.

Rule36: Under the condition that the survivor finds a river, if it is not the case that not having water implies the survivor has supplies leads to the survivor being dehydrated, then the survivor can survive in the forest.
Rule37: If the survivor has a filter, then the survivor has clean water.
Rule38: Either the survivor has a filter, or the survivor has purification tablets.
Rule39: Under the condition that it is not the case that having water implies the survivor has supplies, the survivor is not dehydrated.
Rule40: If it is not the case that seeing a wolf implies the survivor does not encounter a predator, then the survivor gets attacked.
Rule41: Provided that it is not the case that testing with a kit implies if the survivor sees an algae bloom, then the survivor smells chemicals, the survivor ignores warnings.

Rule42: If it is not the case that finding a spring implies if not having water implies the survivor has supplies leads to the survivor being dehydrated, then the survivor can survive in the forest, then the survivor drinks contaminated water.

Rule43: Under the condition that it is not the case that finding a spring implies if not having water implies the survivor has supplies leads to the survivor being dehydrated, then the survivor can survive in the forest, the survivor does not drink contaminated water.
Rule44: If it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, then the survivor drinks unpurified water.
Rule45: If it is not the case that not having water implies the survivor has supplies leads to the survivor being dehydrated, then the survivor builds a shelter.
Rule46: If it is not the case that not having water implies the survivor has supplies leads to the survivor being dehydrated, then it is not the case that the survivor can survive in the forest.
Rule47: Under the condition that it is not the case that not having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water leads to the survivor needing medical help, the survivor finds help.

Rule48: Provided that it is not the case that not having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water leads to the survivor not drinking unpurified water, the survivor drinks from a stagnant pool.
Rule49: If the survivor does not recognize contamination, then the survivor sees an algae bloom.
Rule50: If the survivor does not have clean water, then the survivor has water.
facts: Fact1: The survivor survives the first day.
Fact4: It is not the case that the survivor has supplies.
Fact5: The survivor does not find a cave.
Fact6: The survivor does not get attacked.
Fact7: It is not the case that the survivor drinks anyway.
